meanings.definition: A person or thing that materializes.
meanings.sent1: The magician's assistant was the materializers of all the magic tricks.
meanings.sent2: The materializers of the dream were the artist's paintbrushes and canvas.
meanings.sent3: The materializers of the surprise party were the balloons and decorations.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the materializers of the protagonist's fears took the form of shadowy figures.
meanings.sent5: The materializers of the architect's vision were the bricks and mortar of the building.

meanings.sent1: The group of materializers gathered to discuss their latest projects.
meanings.sent2: The materializers in the room all had different approaches to problem-solving.
meanings.sent3: The materializers decided to collaborate on a new invention together.
meanings.sent4: The materializers' ideas combined to form a truly innovative solution.
meanings.sent5: Each of the materializers brought a unique perspective to the team.
